pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.5: “Yampi mayaṁ, ayye, gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā, ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.8: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.9: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.10: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.11: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.14: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.17.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.18: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena mahāpajāpati gotamī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.2: Therā bhikkhū yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.7: “Na, bhagini, kappati bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo dhammaṁ desetun”ti kukkuccāyantā na desesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.8: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.9: Nisajja kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.11: “Pubbe me, bhante, therā bhikkhū āgantvā dhammaṁ desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.13: Idāni pana—‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti, kukkuccāyantā na desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.15: Atha kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.16: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.17: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā gilānaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ovadituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.18: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.19.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.20: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Gilānā hoti bhikkhunī—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.1.16: na sakkoti ovādāya vā saṁvāsāya vā gantuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.1: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññī bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.2: Upasampannāya vematiko bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.3: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññī bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
